name: 2d pixel drinks (beverage)
description:
2d pixel art includes a total of 61 items. if you donate $2.00 usd you can use this project for anything if you download it for free you can still use it all i ask is you give me a shout out.

this includes: bottles (15), cocktails(10), mixed drinks(10), bottle of soda (6), can(5), empty bottles(5), glasses(5), milkshakes (3), water bottle(2) and a tea cup
